movies.title: Der Bockerer
movies.plot: In diesem beeindruckenden Film werden die schrecklichen Jahre des 2. Weltkriegs aus der Sicht des Fleischhauers Bockerer, der das Nazi-Regime kategorisch ablehnt und das durch seine natuerliche Art mehr als deutlich zum Ausdruck bringt, lebensnah aufgezeigt.
movies.simplePlot: A politically naive Viennese butcher (Bockerer) manages to survive the Nazi occupation of Austria and the second world war.

biography.bio: Karl Merkatz was born on November 17, 1930 in Wiener Neustadt, Lower Austria, Austria. He is an actor, known for Der Bockerer (1981), Der Bockerer 2 (1996) and Anfang 80 (2011).
biography.name: Karl Merkatz

biography.bio: Alfred Böhm was born on March 23, 1920 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for Der Leihopa (1985), Der Bockerer (1981) and Familie Leitner (1958). He died on September 22, 1995 in Ströblitz, Lower Austria, Austria.
biography.name: Alfred Böhm

biography.bio: Hans Holt was born on November 22, 1909 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Karl Johann Hödl. He was an actor and writer, known for Der Leihopa (1985), Der Bockerer (1981) and La famille Trapp en Amérique (1958). He was married to Renate Bremer. He died on August 3, 2001 in Baden, Lower Austria, Austria.
biography.name: Hans Holt

biography.bio: Marte Harell was born on January 4, 1907 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Martha Schömig. She was an actress, known for La chauve-souris (1946), Der Bockerer (1981) and Nuits de Vienne (1939). She was married to Karl Hartl. She died on March 12, 1996 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Marte Harell

biography.bio: Ida Krottendorf was born on April 5, 1927 in Ebreichsdorf, Austria. She was an actress, known for Das ausgefüllte Leben des Alexander Dubronski (1967), Der Bockerer (1981) and Der Bockerer 2 (1996). She was married to Klausjürgen Wussow and Ernst Stankovski. She died on June 23, 1998 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Ida Krottendorf

biography.bio: Rolf Kutschera was born on January 6, 1916 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Rolf Kucera. He was an actor and director, known for Der Bockerer (1981), Louis II de Bavière (1955) and 08/15 s'en va--t-en-guerre (1955). He was married to Susanne von Almassy. He died on January 22, 2012 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Rolf Kutschera

biography.bio: Erni Mangold was born on January 25, 1927 in Groß-Weikersdorf, Lower Austria, Austria as Erna Goldmann. She is an actress, known for Before Sunrise (1995), North Face (2008) and Der letzte Tanz (2014). She was previously married to Heinz Reincke.
biography.name: Erni Mangold

biography.bio: Heinz Marecek was born on September 17, 1945 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor and director, known for SOKO Kitzbühel (2001), Die Bergretter (2009) and Lindenstraße (1985). He was previously married to Julia Migenes.
biography.name: Heinz Marecek

biography.bio: Marianne Nentwich was born on July 22, 1942 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Schloßhotel Orth (1996), Der Bockerer IV - Prager Frühling (2003) and Emilia Galotti (1971).
biography.name: Marianne Nentwich

biography.bio: Thaddäus Podgorski was born on July 19, 1935 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor and director, known for Im Gespräch mit Teddy Podgorski (2010), Der Teddy - Eine Fernsehlegende wird 80 (2015) and Seinerzeit und immer noch (2010).
biography.name: Thaddäus Podgorski

biography.bio: Sieghardt Rupp was born on June 14, 1931 in Bregenz, Vorarlberg, Austria. He was an actor, known for A Fistful of Dollars (1964), La Grande Vadrouille (1966) and Amongst Vultures (1964). He was married to Gotlinde Rupp. He died on July 20, 2015 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Sieghardt Rupp

biography.bio: Regina Sattler was born on October 29, 1961 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Der Bockerer (1981), Der Hund im Computer (1985) and Boeing Boeing (1983).
biography.name: Regina Sattler

biography.bio: Franz Stoss was born on May 28, 1909 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Die liebe Familie (1980), Bei Kerzenlicht (1968) and Leutnant Gustl (1979). He died on June 21, 1995 in Steinbach am Attersee, Upper Austria, Austria.
biography.name: Franz Stoss

biography.bio: Georg Schuchter was born on December 5, 1952 in Salzburg, Austria. He was an actor, known for Der Bockerer (1981), Jeden 3. Sonntag (1995) and Azzurro (1996). He died on September 29, 2001 in Hoher Göll, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Georg Schuchter

biography.bio: Walter Schmidinger was born on April 28, 1933 in Linz, Austria. He was an actor, known for Requiem (2006), Hanussen (1988) and From the Life of the Marionettes (1980). He died on September 28, 2013 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Walter Schmidinger

categories.category: Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role (Beste darstellerische Leistung - Männliche Hauptrolle)
